name: Billy's Massacre
description:
VOTE FOR BILLY!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/billys-massacre

Done in Three days for the LD48

Legends from SouthWick's highschool talk about a curse, those that have exams left and do not assist until the last day, they tend to dissapear..

Some rumours talk about death and kidnapping.

You are a student who's on the last day of exam's recovery! While you try to finish the final classes you feel dread and unnatural feeling..

You may be the next in the victims list from this diabolic entity..

The place is locked down and the only way to leave is to finish your tests!
